A.note_to_self: My starting settlement is on W11, B6, S8. My priority for the next settlement will be to secure Wheat and Ore. Placing the road 20-21 positions me to claim Wheat 9 at Node 32. I should monitor other players' placements to see if any good Ore spots are left.

R.note_to_self: My first settlement at 31 (W11, B10, Wh9) is solid. The road to 19 gives me access to Sheep (S8), making it easier to build my second settlement. My next goal is to identify a good spot for my second settlement, ideally with a port or good numbers, and prioritize getting the remaining resources (1 Wood, 1 Brick, 1 Wheat, 1 Sheep) for it. Node 19 itself is a strong contender for a city later (W11, Wh8, S8).
